snippet: Steven Mnuchin, a longtime Trump acquaintance, is a former Goldman Sachs partner who has worked in hedge funds and Hollywood finance and has no government experience....
abstract: Steven Mnuchin, financier with deep roots on Wall Street and in Hollywood but no government experience, is expected to be named Donald Trump’s Treasury secretary; Mnuchin was national finance chairman for Trump’s campaign and selection would elevate wealthy loyalist to pivotal economic post.

byline.original: By JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS, BINYAMIN APPELBAUM and MAGGIE HABERMAN
byline.contributor: Julie Hirschfeld Davis and Binyamin Appelbaum reported from Washington, and Maggie Haberman from New York. Landon Thomas Jr. contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Steven Mnuchin, a longtime Trump acquaintance, is a former Goldman Sachs partner who has worked in hedge funds and Hollywood finance and has no government experience.

headline.main: Trump Taps Hollywood’s Mnuchin for Treasury and Dines With Romney
headline.print_headline: Movie Financier Is Said to Be Pick for Treasury Job
